nodes.text: The Funeral of Anakin Solo took place on the planet Hapes, once the survivors of the Myrkr strike team returned the body of their fallen leader, Anakin Solo, to his parents Han and Leia Organa Solo. The ceremony took place at night, in a secluded clearing in a mountain forest. A stone bier was constructed and the young Jedi's body laid upon it.

Family and friends gathered to pay their respects, and several delivered brief eulogies for Solo. Once Kyp Durron had voiced his sentiments on the Jedi Knight's role in the Force, Luke Skywalker, Anakin Solo's uncle, came forward to cremate the body, as was customary at Jedi funerals.
